function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Stochastic nature of PD","Impact":"Uncertainty in the resilience metric","Mitigation":"Use robust statistical methods to quantify and reduce the uncertainty","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, Monte Carlo simulations","People":"Researchers, policymakers, and infrastructure planners","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Dependence on dynamic simulation model for time-dependent extension","Impact":"Reliance on accurate simulation models for predicting resilience","Mitigation":"Validate simulation models with real-world data, implement sensitivity analysis","Technologies":"Dynamic simulation tools, sensitivity analysis software","People":"Modelers, simulation experts","Owner":"Research institutions, engineering firms"},{"Description":"Applicability of the resilience metric to different infrastructures","Impact":"Needed adaptation of the efficiency function for different infrastructure types","Mitigation":"Develop adaptable efficiency functions for diverse infrastructure networks","Technologies":"Efficiency modeling, infrastructure network analysis tools","People":"Infrastructure planners, engineers, and researchers","Owner":"Engineering firms, research institutions"}]}
